Text:

@Horrorspoke: I would, without any problems - but - I had terrible crashes of old PC (June-August), which is in hell now - and many files was lost (deleted, erased, gone). Not by me, of course.  If anyone has that, he can load that torrent and seed. I know for a fact that few "regulars" here have it - so, keep torrent loaded for a while. Maybe somebody jump-in.

wow wow wow .. ur just awsm

@htctouch: ALL encodes I have downloaded have high-pitch sound ("peeeeep").
I filtered it out - band notch filter 0.3 octave at 5166 Hz. Applied Noise reduction after. That's all.I NEVER would provide samples for things that aren't questionable. 
It's matter of trust.
So - critics should wait or download someplace else.

man i totaly trust u . i was n im a huge fan of u b4 u got d green skul
but it isnt mater of trust its about choice/preference,i have my own sesibility about audio.. though beggers hv no choice, i just took a chance of asking for sample .. for that m sory

@htctouch: I know all that. Sample cannot be added in finished torrent, it's simply not possible - what is "in" is what one gets.
My sound ALWAYS was BETTER than in any encoding of loosely similar size and same time period of creation - you cannot compare early CAM with BluRay which is released six month later, right?

You have nasty tendency - contrary to fact that we know each-other for a long time and you have downloaded probably hundredths of my encodings ( and dozens of your requests ) - to criticize my work.

It doesn't bother me at all when it comes from some idiot or passer-by - but it realy hurts when:

1. You have criticized sound for no reason:
a) simply because no better can be found
b) it is NOT something YOU NEED or EXPECT
c) you cannot comprehend that I have explained to you that whole sound encoding haven't been changed from 2007. Why? Sound is the best part of my encodings. Smart people never change something proven good.
d) I cannot make flowers from the shit

When I see that you are capable to understand what I just said, maybe you would understand. But, I doubt that.

ok sir im truely sory .. i think iv pissd u off allot
but thr was no intentions like that.. i alwas love ur work n will always do ..
do forgive me im just silly fan of urs
